p: Moreover, if the user enters on M. arvensis variety Gomti button, the database will display a tabular text data showing brief details of plant, variety name, major constituents of given variety such as Menthol 74% in ratio, menthone 12.6%, isomenthone 3.7%, and methyl acetate 2.9%. Beside this database show details of essential oil, GC–MS graph (if available) of essential oil, major compounds peak in GC data, compound property, year of plant variety release and complete reference ( Figures 3A– C ).
